headline: Ask HN: Using PassRight or Bay Immigration Law for O-1?
description:
I'm an early engineer at a startup and trying to select a law firm to work with for an O-1 visa. I've chatted with PassRight (https://www.passright.com/) and Bay Immigration Law (https://bayimmigrationlaw.com/). They both have legit online reviews, but I'd really love to chat with someone who has worked with either and ask about their experiences.

Thanks! :)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 使用PassRight或Bay移民法申请O-1？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 使用PassRight或Bay移民法申請O-1？
description_zh-Hans:
我是一家初创公司的早期工程师，正试图选择一家律师事务所合作办理O-1签证。我已经与PassRight（https://www.passright.com/）和Bay Immigration Law（https://bayimmigrationlaw.com/）聊过。他们都有合法的网上评论，但我真的很想和与这两家公司合作过的人聊聊，问问他们的经验。

谢谢! :)
description_zh-Hant:
我是一家初創公司的早期工程師，正試圖選擇一家律師事務所合作辦理O-1簽證。我已經與PassRight（https://www.passright.com/）和Bay Immigration Law（https://bayimmigrationlaw.com/）聊過。他們都有合法的網上評論，但我真的很想和與這兩家公司合作過的人聊聊，問問他們的經驗。

謝謝! :)
